column1: Congratulations! You've won a $1000 Walmart gift card. Click here to claim now.
Reminder: Your electricity bill is due tomorrow. Kindly pay to avoid late fees.
You have been selected for a free vacation to the Bahamas. Reply with your details.
Meeting rescheduled to 3 PM tomorrow. Please confirm your availability.
URGENT: Update your bank details immediately to avoid account suspension.
Lunch at 1 PM? Let's try the new Italian restaurant.
Exclusive offer: Get 90% off on luxury watches. Limited time only!
Project deadline is extended to next week. Share updates by Friday.
Your Amazon order has been shipped. Track your package here.
Win big in the online lottery today! Just register with your credit card.
